item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】M4A - MARIAH CARREY - 1994 - MERRY CHRISTMAS [2CD] [2019 DELUXE ANNIVERSARY EDITION] [24BIT-96HZ] [+ VIDEOS]
item.description: thanks
item.author: XRB80

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - Paul Mccartney @ Maracanã 16/12 (Disney+ / Star+)
item.description:
Artist: Mariah Carrey
Album: Merry Christmas [ 2CD] [2019 Deluxe Edition]
Date: 01 October 1994
Genre: Christmas, Gospel, Pop, R&B, Soul, Dance
Quality: 24bit-96Hz
Country: USA
Size: 7,1GB

Tracklist:

CD1:
​
01 Silent Night 03:41​
02 All I Want for Christmas Is You 04:01​
03 O Holy Night 04:27​
04 Christmas (Baby Please Come Home) 02:35​
05 Miss You Most (At Christmas Time) 04:33​
06 Joy to the World 04:20​
07 Jesus Born on This Day 03:42​
08 Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town 03:24​
09 Hark! The Herald Angels Sing : Gloria (In Excelsis Deo) 03:00​
10 Jesus Oh What a Wonderful Child 04:29​
11 God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen 01:18​

​
​

• Bonus HDMV:​

12 All I Want For Christmas Is You - SD 03:56​
13 All I Want For Christmas Is You (Black & White) 03:57​
14 All I Want for Christmas Is You (Unreleased Video Footage) 04:01​
15 All I Want for Christmas Is You (Make My Wish Come True Edition) 04:03​
16 All I Want for Christmas Is You (Lyric Video) 04:00​
17 All I Want for Christmas Is You (Festive Lambs Edition) 04:06​
18 Miss You Most (At Christmas Time) - SD 04:31​
19 O Holy Night 04:48​



CD2:
​
01 Sugar Plum Fairy Introlude 00:44​
02 All I Want for Christmas Is You (Live at The Cathedral of St. John The Divine) 05:05​
03 Silent Night (Live at The Cathedral of St. John The Divine) 03:44
04 Joy to the World (Live at The Cathedral of St. John The Divine) 05:39
05 Hark! The Herald Angels Sing : Gloria (In Excelsis Deo) (Live at The Cathedral of St. John The Divine) 03:03
06 Jesus Born On This Day (Live at The Cathedral of St. John The Divine) 03:45
07 Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town (Live at The Cathedral of St. John The Divine) 03:27
08 Oh Santa! 03:31
09 Christmas Time Is in the Air Again 03:02
10 When Christmas Comes (with John Legend) 04:46
11 The Star 04:01
12 Lil Snowman 03:18
13 Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town (Anniversary Mix) 02:4
14 All I Want for Christmas Is You (feat. Jermaine Dupri & Bow Wow) [So So Def Remix] 03:43
15 All I Want for Christmas Is You (Mariah's New Dance Mix Extended 2009) 06:41
16 Joy to the World (Celebration Mix) 08:00
17 Joy to the World (Flava Mix) 07:05
18 Sugar Plum Fairy Introlude (Acapella) 00:40​

​

+ Exclusive Digital Booklet​

​
​

• Bonus HDMV:​

19 All I Want For Christmas Is You (Live at St. John The Divine) 05:03​
20 Silent Night (Live at St. John The Divine) 03:38​
21 Joy to the World (Live at St. John the Divine) 05:32​
22 Hark! The Herald Angels Sing (Live at St. John The Divine) 02:58​
23 Jesus Born On This Day (Live at St. John The Divine) 03:42​
24 Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town (Live at St. John The Divine) 02:49​
25 The Star 04:01​
26 Lil Snowman 03:24​
27 Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town (Anniversary Mix) [Animated Video] - SD 03:08​
28 All I Want for Christmas Is You (J.D. Remix Animated) - SD 03:46​
29 Joy to the World (Celebration Mix) 03:24​
30 Happy Anniversary, All I Want For Christmas Is You 04:03​
